name: toxic-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Poison moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Poison.
short_effect: Held: Posion-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Posion.
